Release
LTS.456.6
of May 16, 2025
In release
LTS.456
, a new
system setting
was added in the "Additional" section. In some cases, the default value could cause the section’s settings to reset when updating the instance.
Please check the system settings in the "Additional" section and, if necessary, revert them to the values required for the correct operation.
The issue was present in the following public versions:
LTS.456.4
.
These versions have been revoked, and additional patches have been released that fix the issue:
LTS.456.6
.
New features
It is now possible to create a subject area based on a custom description using AI.
At the moment the subject area generation only supports Russian language, other languages will be available later.
The procedure for
installing updates
was improved:
Now, when downloading multiple *.guf files, there is no need to keep track of the order of objects.
Checking an update provides a complete list of missing objects with the ability to export a list of errors that can be applied when generating an update on the source instance.
Now the status of a payment made using
widget “Payment” widget
can be saved and processed on the platform level.
The list of
events
was extended, now triggering algorithms can be configured based on opening and/or closing an instance.
Managing
anonymous login mode
is now possible directly from the app.
To optimize disk space usage, a mechanism for timely deleting temporary files was implemented.
The option to lock file previews that contain comments and/or corrections is now available via
system settings
.
It is now possible to control the permissions of files uploaded to the System and check them for malicious content via
configuration file parameters
.
Changes and improvements
The ability to clear pre-filled values when
creating an object
is now available in the modal window.
The ability to create an object via a child attribute and close the modal window via hotkeys was improved.
The process of filtering by the “ Configured groups” user attribute of the “Security principal” type was debugged.
The validation error text when grouping by attribute is impossible was improved.
The “Module” [SYS_MODULE] object type was deleted.
In the object type “Task Scheduler. Launch algorithm” [SYS_SCHED_ALG] object type the value in the “Algorithm to be execute” field was added.
Hiding buttons
on the registry control panel can now be applied to an object attribute with
“Registry for multiselect attribute” visual
.
The display of content in
grouping
containers when the window scale or width changes was stabilized.
The process of scrolling the contents of the text attribute and workspace depending on the cursor location was debugged.
A tooltip was added to the visual in the “Marketplaces and external systems” system settings.
The process of deleting a copy of a dashboard was debugged.
The data loading in
analytical dashboards
was optimized.
The ability of filtering and sorting
table
data when the “Periodic automatic data update” option is active was debugged.
The description of validation error when attribute values change as a result of moving a task between
kanban board
stages was improved.
Changing the relationship  type of the
object data source
was stabilized (was implemented in
LTS.454.2
).
The work of
SQL-based data sources
was stabilized.
The mechanism of business process completing was improved: in case of failed validation the error description is displayed in the route.
The settings transfer when copying a business process version was optimized.
Processing of switching to the previous page when completing a business process task was improved: if there is no information about the previous page, the user will remain on the current page.
The ability to process arithmetic method calls for a numeric value when compiling an algorithm was improved.
The possibility of filtering by SQL condition with parameters was stabilized.
The settings for the
“Sign the file using a simple e-signature”
action were improved.
The execution of a scheduled action on ETL process start with required attributes was stabilized.
Generation of updates containing widgets was stabilized.
The process of verifying access permissions to objects when installing updates was improved.
When the password policy is active during the authentication password change process, the error text for entering a password that does not meet the security criteria was adjusted.
The ability to connect to Oracle Database via ETL was debugged.
Working with The Analysis of Financial and Economic Activity module (AFEA) was optimized.
The ability to change the preview mode to the bookmark mode was stabilized.
The process of generating and downloading a print form with the active “Optimize document generation” setting was debugged.
Working with an electronic document when setting line spacing was stabilized.
Saving the size of images in the generated printed form with the “Scale image” feature disabled and displaying the number according to the specified tabulation was stabilized.
The ability to view the contents of documents created after previewing using the “Open in EDoc” button was stabilized.
The ability to generate a printed form by attached file with hidden objects was stabilized (hidden objects are not processed by the system).
When the “Block file preview with comments and/or corrections” feature is active, it is now possible to preview *.xlsx, *.pptx and *.pdf files without comments and/or corrections.
